alert.note: Alert for Adams; Brown; Butler; Clermont; Clinton; Hamilton; Highland; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 16 at 8:27AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of South Central Ohio and Southwest Ohio, including the following counties, in South Central Ohio, Adams and Highland. In Southwest Ohio, Brown, Butler, Clermont, Clinton, Hamilton and Warren. * WHEN...Until 1030 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 827 AM EST, radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1 inch are possible. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Hamilton, Fairfield, Mason, Lebanon, Forest Park, Sharonville, Wilmington, Monroe, Blue Ash, Loveland, Springdale, Montgomery, Hillsboro, Georgetown, Blanchester, West Chester, Ross, Amelia, Mount Orab and Bethel.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. To report flooding, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Brown; Butler; Clermont; Clinton; Hamilton; Highland; Warren
